mapper.select: SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CORP_NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.RESPONSIBILITY , EMP.QUALIFICATION , EMP.PREFERENTIAL , EMP.SALARY , EMP.BENEFITS , EMP.INTRODUCE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , EMP.DEADLINE , CORP.COMPANY_NAME , CORP.COMPANY_ADDRESS , CORP.LOGO , CORP.THUMB , EC.TYPE FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON EMP.CORP_NO = CORP.NO JOIN EMP_CATE EC ON EMP.CATEGORY = EC.NO WHERE EMP.NO = #{no}

SELECT EMP.NO , EMP.CATEGORY , EMP.TITLE , EMP.SECTOR , EMP.ADDRESS , EMP.CAREER , CORP.COMPANY_NAME FROM EMPLOYMENT EMP JOIN CORPORATE_MEMBER CORP ON EMP.CORP_NO = CORP.NO WHERE EMP.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND EMP.DEADLINE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY EMP.NO DESC
